text: today's recipe is super delish it has
all the flavors of my favorite summer
drinks strawberry daiquiris pina coladas
and even mojitos it's a mixed fruit
salad with strawberries pineapple lime
and mint and to top it all off a little
bit of coconut I have a pound of
strawberries that I'm just finishing
slicing up these strawberries are really
great it's strawberry season finally I
have been waiting all year we don't get
good strawberries here for very long so
when we do I try to take advantage just
quarter up your strawberries you can see
that the inside of these strawberries
are perfectly red and luscious looking
that's exactly what you're looking for
in a strawberry and then cut up your
pineapple get one that smells really
good and you know it'll taste good so
give it a smell when you're buying it
and if it doesn't have a too much aroma
at the beginning it may develop over
time but better safe than sorry is what
I say I usually buy them and let them
sit on my counter for a day or two to
develop deliciousness cut off both ends
and then stand it up on its end and cut
down removing the thorny skin you can
put this skin in water because there's a
little bit of pineapple still attached
just stick the skins in unlike a gallon
of water and let them sit in the
refrigerator overnight you get like a
nice lightly pineapple flavored water
it's good you could put some mint in
that too if you wanted to you want to
make sure that you go deep enough to
remove the eyes but not so deep that you
can't have the pineapple away while
you're doing it this does smell quite
fragrant and delicious it's turned out
to be kind of a tiny little pineapple I
like to slice mine in quarters and then
remove the core that way but you can use
a pineapple corer if you want to this is
the perfect salad to make for a summer
barbecue nice and light and refreshing
you can serve it with your grilled meats
or you can serve it as dessert if you
want to if you want something simple and

a great dessert idea or in addition to

salad at our summer barbecue the course
can go into your water too you can slice

you can slice up everything and prep

building mine in layers you don't have

just think it looks so beautiful this
